name: Froggy the Frog
description:
Froggy the Frog is a very short game about your beloved virtual pet, Froggy! :-)

How to play: arrow keys to move/interact.

I know the BGM is not looped, but I hope it works just fine!

There are 2 endings! :-)

Made for the bitsy jam, "virtual pet".

Here, you can also play my other virtual pet themed game, made for the "one room" bitsy game.
